author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...POTENTIAL TROPICAL CYCLONE FIFTEEN EXPECTED TO BRING HEAVY RAINFALL TO PORTIONS OF BELIZE AND MEXICO...
summary:
...POTENTIAL TROPICAL CYCLONE FIFTEEN EXPECTED TO BRING HEAVY RAINFALL TO PORTIONS OF BELIZE AND MEXICO...
 As of 4:00 PM CDT Fri Oct 18
 the center of Fifteen was located near 17.5, -85.0
 with movement WNW at 7 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1005 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

title: Summary - Potential Tropical Cyclone Fifteen (AT5/AL152024)
